languages.text: "Реверсивный анализ указывает, что диверсия была предсказуема. Директивы взаимодействия с ксенорасами предупреждают о склонности нелюдей к нарушению контрактов. Данные о ненадежности единицы Ирлиэт внесены в архив". {n}Голос Паскаля сух и равнодушен, но буровой мехадендрит разражается грозным рычанием.{/n}

"Reverse analysis is showing the act of sabotage to have been predictable. The directives for interacting with xenoraces warn about non-humans' proclivity for breaching contracts. The data concerning the unreliability of the unit Yrliet has been archived." {n}Pasqal's voice is dry and indifferent, but his drilling mechadendrite roars menacingly.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Реверсивный анализ указывает, что диверсия была предсказуема. Директивы взаимодействия с ксенорасами предупреждают о склонности нелюдей к нарушению контрактов. Данные о ненадежности единицы Ирлиэт внесены в архив". {n}Голос Паскаля сух и равнодушен, но буровой мехадендрит разражается грозным рычанием.{/n}

The data concerning the unreliability of the unit Yrliet has been archived." {n}Pasqal's voice is dry and indifferent, but his drilling mechadendrite roars menacingly.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “逆向分析表明，这样的破坏行为是可以预见的。与异形种族互动的相关指令早已警告过，非人类生物拥有违反合约的倾向。关于异形单位伊莉耶特不可靠性的数据，已经进行了归档。”{n}帕斯卡的声音干涩而冷漠，但他机械触须却像钻头一样，发出了气势汹汹的咆哮声。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Reverse analysis is showing the act of sabotage to have been predictable. The directives for interacting with xenoraces warn about non-humans' proclivity for breaching contracts. The data concerning the unreliability of the unit Yrliet has been archived." {n}Pasqal's voice is dry and indifferent, but his drilling mechadendrite roars menacingly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “逆向分析表明，这样的破坏行为是可以预见的。与异形种族互动的相关指令早已警告过，非人类生物拥有违反合约的倾向。关于异形单位伊莉耶特不可靠性的数据，已经进行了归档。”{n}帕斯卡的声音干涩而冷漠，但他机械触须却像钻头一样，发出了气势汹汹的咆哮声。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «El análisis inverso indica que el sabotaje era completamente predecible. Las directrices sobre la interacción con razas xenos nos advierten de la proclividad de los no humanos a romper contratos. He archivado los datos relacionados con la baja fiabilidad de la unidad Yrliet». {n}El tono de Pasqal es seco e indiferente, pero el taladro de su mecadendrita ruge amenazador.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Reverse analysis is showing the act of sabotage to have been predictable. The directives for interacting with xenoraces warn about non-humans' proclivity for breaching contracts. The data concerning the unreliability of the unit Yrliet has been archived." {n}Pasqal's voice is dry and indifferent, but his drilling mechadendrite roars menacingly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «El análisis inverso indica que el sabotaje era completamente predecible. Las directrices sobre la interacción con razas xenos nos advierten de la proclividad de los no humanos a romper contratos. He archivado los datos relacionados con la baja fiabilidad de la unidad Yrliet». {n}El tono de Pasqal es seco e indiferente, pero el taladro de su mecadendrita ruge amenazador.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「逆解析の結果、妨害行為は予測可能であったことが判明している。異種族との交流に関する指令は、人間以外が契約を破る傾向があることを警告している。ユリエットユニットの信頼性の低さに関するデータはアーカイブされている」{n}パスカルの声は乾いた無関心なものだが、彼の機械触手は威嚇するように唸りをあげている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Reverse analysis is showing the act of sabotage to have been predictable. The directives for interacting with xenoraces warn about non-humans' proclivity for breaching contracts. The data concerning the unreliability of the unit Yrliet has been archived." {n}Pasqal's voice is dry and indifferent, but his drilling mechadendrite roars menacingly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「逆解析の結果、妨害行為は予測可能であったことが判明している。異種族との交流に関する指令は、人間以外が契約を破る傾向があることを警告している。ユリエットユニットの信頼性の低さに関するデータはアーカイブされている」{n}パスカルの声は乾いた無関心なものだが、彼の機械触手は威嚇するように唸りをあげている。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Die Rückwärtsanalyse zeigt, dass der Sabotageakt vorhersehbar war. Die Direktiven für die Interaktion mit Xenovölkern warnen vor der nicht-menschlichen Neigung zum Vertragsbruch. Die Daten über die Unzuverlässigkeit der Einheit Yrliet wurden archiviert." {n}Pasqals Stimme ist trocken und gleichgültig, doch sein Bohr-Mechadendrit brüllt bedrohlich auf.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Reverse analysis is showing the act of sabotage to have been predictable. The directives for interacting with xenoraces warn about non-humans' proclivity for breaching contracts. The data concerning the unreliability of the unit Yrliet has been archived." {n}Pasqal's voice is dry and indifferent, but his drilling mechadendrite roars menacingly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Die Rückwärtsanalyse zeigt, dass der Sabotageakt vorhersehbar war. Die Direktiven für die Interaktion mit Xenovölkern warnen vor der nicht-menschlichen Neigung zum Vertragsbruch. Die Daten über die Unzuverlässigkeit der Einheit Yrliet wurden archiviert." {n}Pasqals Stimme ist trocken und gleichgültig, doch sein Bohr-Mechadendrit brüllt bedrohlich auf.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Une rétro-analyse indique que le sabotage était prévisible. Les directives d'interaction avec les espèces xénos sont claires quant à la tendance des non humains à rompre les contrats. Les données concernant le manque de fiabilité de l'unité Yrliet ont été archivées. » {n}La voix de Pasqal est sèche et indifférente, mais sa mécadendrite foreuse vrombit de façon menaçante.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Reverse analysis is showing the act of sabotage to have been predictable. The directives for interacting with xenoraces warn about non-humans' proclivity for breaching contracts. The data concerning the unreliability of the unit Yrliet has been archived." {n}Pasqal's voice is dry and indifferent, but his drilling mechadendrite roars menacingly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Une rétro-analyse indique que le sabotage était prévisible. Les directives d'interaction avec les espèces xénos sont claires quant à la tendance des non humains à rompre les contrats. Les données concernant le manque de fiabilité de l'unité Yrliet ont été archivées. » {n}La voix de Pasqal est sèche et indifférente, mais sa mécadendrite foreuse vrombit de façon menaçante.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "Reverse analysis is showing the act of sabotage to have been predictable. The directives for interacting with xenoraces warn about non-humans' proclivity for breaching contracts. The data concerning the unreliability of the unit Yrliet has been archived." {n}Pasqal's voice is dry and indifferent, but his drilling mechadendrite roars menacingly.{/n}

languages.text: "Geri analizler, sabotaj eyleminin öngörülebilir olduğunu gösteriyor. Zeno ırklarla etkileşimlere dair talimatlar, insan dışıların yapılan anlaşmalara uymama eğiliminde oldukları konusunda uyarılar içeriyor. Yrliet biriminin güvenilmezliğine ilişkin veriler arşivlerde bulunmakta." {n}Pasqal'ın sesi kuru ve kayıtsızken mekadentritindeki matkaptan tehditkâr sesler çıkıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Reverse analysis is showing the act of sabotage to have been predictable. The directives for interacting with xenoraces warn about non-humans' proclivity for breaching contracts. The data concerning the unreliability of the unit Yrliet has been archived." {n}Pasqal's voice is dry and indifferent, but his drilling mechadendrite roars menacingly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Gerçekleştirilen geri analizler, sabotaj eyleminin öngörülebileceğini gösteriyor. Zeno ırklarla girilecek etkileşimler hakkındaki talimatlar, insan dışıların yapılan anlaşmalara uymama eğiliminde oldukları konusunda uyarılar içerir. Yrliet biriminin güvenilmezliğine ilişkin veriler arşivlerde bulunmakta." {n}Pasqal'ın sesi kuru ve kayıtsız ancak mekadentritindeki matkaptan tehditkâr sesler çıkıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
